title: Steve
body:
Steve: Come to help out?
[[Yes|Steve.Fence]]
[[No, just came to chat|Steve.Snark]]

title: Steve.Snark
body:
Steve: Maybe we can trade jobs. 
Steve: You can do all the hard labor
Steve: and I can walk around talking to people all day. . . 
[[Steve.Talk]]

title: Steve.Fence
body:
<<if visited ("Steve.Fence") is false>>
Steve: I'm just fixing the fence right now.
Steve: It's sort of a one-person job.
<<else>>
Steve: I'm still working on this fence.
<<endif>>
Steve: You can always check with Tim to see if anyone else needs help.
[[Okay.|Steve.Exit]]
[[I want to stay and chat|Steve.Snark]]

title: Steve.Talk
body:
Norra: So how long have you worked here?
Steve: A couple years...
Norra: And how does one become a gardener for a living, anyway?
Steve: Well, technically I'm not a gardener. 
Steve: I take care of the whole estate, not just the gardens. 
Norra: Mr. Fancy Pants. . . 
Steve: Yeah, I'm epic. 
Norra: So, do you study that in school?
Steve: Straight A student in Epicness. . .
Norra: No, an estate worker. . . groundskeeper? Nature man?
Steve: I studied Forestry at University.
Norra: What kind of stuff do you learn in Forestry school?
Steve: Quercus rober. 
Norra: Uh... what?
Steve: Crataegus monogyna.
Norra: Now you're just being gross. 
Steve: They are scientific names for trees.
Steve: Quercus rober is English oak. Crataegus monogyna is hawthorn.
Norra: That's really cool, actually.
Steve: Obviously, because I taught you.
Norra: What other cool stuff can you teach me?
Steve: What do you want to know?
Norra: Can I drive the tractor?
Steve: Hah! Maybe someday I'll let you drive the tractor. 
Steve: When I want to buy a new tractor. . .

title: Steve.Exit
body: Steve: Keep up the hard work!
